reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Emergency intervention to ensure access to health services to vulnerable refugees and migrants from Venezuela, Colombian returnees

description.narrative: L’iniziativa fornirà una risposta di emergenza per garantire l'accesso ai servizi sanitari e di salute sessuale e riproduttiva e alle opportunità di integrazione socio-economica ai rifugiati e ai migranti vulnerabili provenienti dal Venezuela, ai rimpatriati colombiani e alle comunità ospitanti in alcuni dipartimenti della Colombia (Arauca, Atlántico, Magdalena, Norte de Santander, Santander) con focus particolare su giovani e donne.

The programme will provide emergency response to ensure access to sexual and reproductive healthcare services and socio-economic integration opportunities to vulnerable refugees and migrants from 2 Venezuela, Colombian returnees and host communities in selected departments in Colombia (Arauca, Atlántico, Magdalena, Norte de Santander, Santander) with a particular focus on youth and women.

tag.narrative: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance
